metadata.name: Beg For It (Acoustic) LIVE
metadata.description:
To celebrate 10K+ streams of his latest single "Beg For It", X&ND is gifting the XANDYLANDERS with an exclusive acoustic performance, hosted at the SUPERF3ST Superlounge during Art Basel Miami 2022. 

For this performance, X&ND wrapped up a weekend of performances across Art Basel with an intimate acoustic show for all Rise of X&ND and Superpass holders where he performed one of his favorite sets, "Summer Moon CafÃ©". 

This historic NFT also marks the first token on the XANDYLAND Exclusives contract, a contract through which XANDYLANDERS can claim exclusive community content, as well as X&ND's first video NFT.

The footage was captured by Eric Horn at Direct Narrative, with captioning and audio engineering provided by X&ND. Cover art by James Montero and X&ND.

Thank you for being a day one ðŸ’”
